summary: In this context, 3-Nitrotyrosine and 3-nitrotyrosine refer to the same compound, as indicated by the different naming conventions. The analysis involves the quantification of this analyte in exhaled breath condensate (EBC) samples using liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (LCâ€“MS/MS). The focus is on the detection and quantification methods rather than any distinct relationship between the two terms, which are essentially identical.
